alfredsnippet.snippet:
# Show usage and exit if no arguments.
 if [ "$#" = 0 ]; then 
   usage
 fi

 # Parse options.
 while :; do
   case $1 in
     --help)
       usage
       ;;
     --someFlag)
       someFlag=1
       ;;
     *) break
   esac
   shift
 done

 # Get the content from FILENAME or stdin.
 content="$(cat "${1:-/dev/stdin}")"
alfredsnippet.name: bash script file args
